entry.title: Beginnings
entry.content:
Where do you begin to challenge injustice that circles the globe -
where do you begin to advocate for peace,
when the tables of almost everyone,
when the bowels of almost everyone,
are full of suffering,
are full of violence,
are full of indifference?

It feels like a daunting task,
but it is one that must be begun,
for if we never begin,
we will never arrive at a better world.

A world of empathy, kindness and compassion.
A world where all are recognised for their intrinsic value.

Ahimsā!

author.name: Gerald Tūruapō Jordan, MBA, MEd, MCouns
